about_the_game:
The original soundtrack to Broken Spectre, a VR cosmic horror narrative experience from Games by Stitch. Enjoy comforting and familiar sounds of acoustic guitars in the Lower Valley, through dark disorienting synthesizers and horror moments, all the way to the psychedelic space-rock-inspired final climb. Experience over an hour of music that will take you on a journey through Casey's story.

"Searching for her long-lost father, Casey hears news that he may still be alive in the treacherous wilderness of Northwest Canada. She heads to Coldblood Mountain where she discovers evidence of her father's research. With severe weather conditions closing in and evil lurking around her, the journey soon turns from investigation to a desperate attempt to escape. Will she survive to find the truth? Only the tale will tell."

Soundtrack composed and produced by Robby Duguay
Track 28 co-written and performed by halina heron
Additional orchestration by Thomas Kresge
